meanings.definition: blunderers: people who make mistakes or errors
meanings.sent1: The blunderers in the office often forget important details.
meanings.sent2: The team of blunderers struggled to complete the project without errors.
meanings.sent3: The blunderers at the party kept spilling their drinks.
meanings.sent4: The blunderers in the comedy show had the audience laughing at their mistakes.
meanings.sent5: The blunderers in the game always ended up losing due to their errors.

meanings.definition: blunderers: to make a careless or stupid mistake
meanings.sent1: She blunderers by accidentally deleting the important file.
meanings.sent2: He often blunderers when he rushes through his work.
meanings.sent3: The chef blunderers by adding salt instead of sugar to the cake.
meanings.sent4: The driver blunderers by taking the wrong turn and getting lost.
meanings.sent5: The student blunderers on the test by forgetting to answer the last question.
